00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #include <time.h>
00022 #include <stdexcept>
00023 
00024 // Utilities includes
00025 
00026 #include "../Purple/Utilities/Vector.h"
00027 #include "../Purple/Utilities/Matrix.h"
00028 
00029 // Objective function includes
00030 
00031 #include "../Purple/ObjectiveFunction/DeJongFunction.h"
00032 
00033 // Optimization algorithm includes
00034 
00035 #include "../Purple/OptimizationAlgorithm/GradientDescent.h"
00036 
00039 
00040 using namespace Purple;
00041 
00042 int main(void)
00043 {
00044    std::cout << std::endl
00045              << "Purple: An Open Source Numerical Optimization C++ Library." 
00046              << std::endl
00047              << "Gradient Descent Application." << std::endl;
00048 
00049 
00050    srand( (unsigned)time( NULL ) );
00051 
00052    // De Jong function object
00053 
00054    DeJongFunction deJongFunction;
00055 
00056    int numberOfVariables = 3;
00057 
00058    deJongFunction.setNumberOfVariables(numberOfVariables);
00059 
00060    Vector<double> lowerBound(numberOfVariables, -5.12);
00061    Vector<double> upperBound(numberOfVariables, -5.12);
00062 
00063    deJongFunction.setLowerBound(lowerBound);
00064    deJongFunction.setUpperBound(upperBound);
00065 
00066    // Gradient descent object
00067 
00068    GradientDescent gradientDescent(&deJongFunction);
00069 
00070    gradientDescent.setOptimalStepSizeMethod(GradientDescent::BrentMethod);
00071 
00072    gradientDescent.setOptimalStepSizeTolerance(1.0e-6);
00073 
00074    gradientDescent.setEvaluationGoal(0.0);
00075    gradientDescent.setGradientNormGoal(0.0);
00076    gradientDescent.setMaximumNumberOfIterations(100);
00077    gradientDescent.setMaximumTime(1000.0);
00078    
00079    gradientDescent.setShowPeriod(10);
00080   
00081    Vector<double> initialArgument(numberOfVariables, 1.0);
00082 
00083    gradientDescent.setInitialArgument(initialArgument);
00084 
00085    gradientDescent.print();
00086    
00087    gradientDescent.save("../Data/GradientDescent/GradientDescent.dat");
00088      
00089    Vector<double> minimalArgument = gradientDescent.getMinimalArgument();
00090 
00091    gradientDescent
00092    .saveOptimizationHistory("../Data/GradientDescent/OptimizationHistory.dat");
00093 
00094    std::cout << std::endl;         
00095 
00096    return(0);
00097 }
